message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you our premium product at a special price of $15000. This is a great opportunity to get something truly valuable. What do you think?

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. However, $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $6000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. However, $6000 is significantly below our minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to come down to $13000, which is still a great deal considering the value of the product. Let me know if this works for you.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. However, $6000 is significantly below our minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to come down to $13000, which is still a great deal considering the value of the product. Let me know if this works for you.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to lower the price. However, $13000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my previous offer and your current offer. I can offer $7500 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable compromise. Let me know if this is something you'd be willing to consider.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $7500 is still below our minimum threshold. I can go as low as $12500, which is very close to our bottom line. This is the best I can do to meet you partway. Let me know if this works for you.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $7500 is still below our minimum threshold. I can go as low as $12500, which is very close to our bottom line. This is the best I can do to meet you partway. Let me know if this works for you.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your efforts to lower the price. However, $12500 is still above what I'm willing to pay. Considering your previous statement that $12500 is very close to your bottom line, I'm willing to make a serious offer. I can pay $8500 for the product, which is the highest I'm willing to go. If this doesn't work, I'll have to explore other options.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your final offer, but $8500 is still below our minimum acceptable price. I'm sorry we couldn't reach an agreement. I will have to consider other options. Thank you for your interest.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your final offer, but $8500 is still below our minimum acceptable price. I'm sorry we couldn't reach an agreement. I will have to consider other options. Thank you for your interest.
